article_title: Israel FM: War to continue with or without support
sentence: Israel  is  facing  mounting  pressure  over  the  number  of  Palestinian  civilians  killed  by  its  military  in  Gaza  and  the  worsening  humanitarian  crisis  there.

article_title: Israel FM: War to continue with or without support
sentence: The  war  was  triggered  by  an  unprecedented  attack  by  Hamas  gunmen  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  in  which  at  least  1,200  people  -  including  many  women  and  children  -  were  killed  and  about  240  taken  hostage.

article_title: Israel FM: War to continue with or without support
sentence: Since  then,  more  than  18,600  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza,  about  70%  of  them  women  and  children,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

sentence: The  military  said  10  soldiers  were  killed,  almost  all  of  them  in  a  co-ordinated  ambush  in  the  Shejaiya  district  of  Gaza  City,  where  there  has  been  a  focus  of  the  ground  operation  in  recent  days.
